headline: ExxonMobil Accelerates Permian Growth, Aims for 2.3M Barrels by 2030
summary: XOM lifts Permian growth with new proppant tech and fresh Midland acreage as it works toward 2.3M barrels a day by 2030.

headline: ExxonMobil Hikes 2030 Outlook, Lifts Earnings and Cash Flow Growth
summary: XOM lifts its 2030 outlook with higher earnings, stronger cash flow and rising upstream output achieved without extra spending.

headline: 2 AI Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Now Before they Soar like GEV
summary: GE Vernova's big breakout should have investors looking to buy other best-in-class AI energy stocks before they soar to new highs. The two top AI energy stocks we dive into are Constellation Energy and NextEra Energy.

headline: CFOs On the Move: Week ending Dec. 12
summary: ExxonMobil’s CFO to retire due to health reasons, Workiva appoints a former Workday exec as finance chief, and Dropbox’s chief financial officer to step down.

headline: The Permian “Peak” That Isn’t
summary: The Permian Basin may hit its all-time production high this month, but instead of peaking, it is transitioning into a mature, tech-driven “manufacturing” phase.

raw.headline: The Permian “Peak” That Isn’t
raw.summary: The Permian Basin may hit its all-time production high this month, but instead of peaking, it is transitioning into a mature, tech-driven “manufacturing” phase.
